orego.patterns

Class ColorSpecificPattern

  • java.lang.Object
    • orego.patterns.Pattern
      • orego.patterns.SimplePattern
        • orego.patterns.ColorSpecificPattern

  • public class ColorSpecificPattern
extends SimplePattern
    A pattern that only applies when a specific color is to play.
